name: Cold War io (opoly)
description:
Cold War io is a property trading game about the Cold War. The Cold War was a state of political, military, and economic tension following the end of World War II. The Cold War was between the powers in the Western Bloc (the United States, NATO, and its Western European allies) and the powers in the Eastern Bloc (the Soviet Union and its Communist Allies in the Warsaw Pact).

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
